sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store

Class StoreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store.StoreController

  • public class StoreController
extends java.lang.Object
    This control object manages changes in CashStore attributes and the DrinksStore attributes.
    Version:
    3.0 5/07/2003
    Author:
    Olivo Miotto, Pang Ping Li
    See Also:
    CashStore, CashStoreItem, Coin, DrinksBrand, DrinksStore, DrinksStoreItem, Store, StoreItem, StoreObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StoreController(PropertyLoader cashLoader, PropertyLoader drinksLoader)
      This constructor creates an instance of StoreController object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeStoreQty(int type, int idx, int qty)
      This method will either:
      - instruct the CashStore to update the quantity of a Coin denomination to new value supplied and update the total cash held in the CashStore; or
      - instruct the DrinksStore to update the drinks stock for a DrinksBrand required to a new value supplied.
      void closeDown()
      This method will close down the store management function of the vending machine.
      void dispenseDrink(int idx)
      This method instructs the DrinksStore to dispense one drink, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether dispensing was successful.
      Store getStore(int type)
      This method returns a Store of a specified type (i.e. Cash or Drink).
      StoreItem getStoreItem(int type, int idx)
      This method returns the StoreItem with the given Store type and index of StoreItem.
      StoreItem[] getStoreItems(int type)
      This method returns an array of StoreItem of the given type of Store.
      int getStoreSize(int type)
      This method return the total size of the Store of the given type of Store.
      int getTotalCash()
      This method returns the total number of cash held in the CashStore.
      void giveChange(int idx, int numOfCoins)
      This method instructs the CashStore to issue a number of Coin of a specific denomination, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It return TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether the change issue was successful.
      void initialize()
      This method instantiate the CashStore, DrinksStore and initialize it.
      void setPrice(int idx, int pr)
      This method will sets the price for the StoreItem with the given index and price.
      void storeCoin(Coin c)
      This method will instruct the CashStore to store the Coin sent as input, and update the display on the Machinery Simulator Panel.
      int transferAll()
      This method will instruct the CashStore to store the Coin sent as input, and then update the display on the MachinerySimulatorPanel.

      • StoreController

        public StoreController(PropertyLoader cashLoader,
                       PropertyLoader drinksLoader)
        This constructor creates an instance of StoreController object.
        Parameters:
        cashLoader - the cash loader.
        drinksLoader - the drinks loader.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method instantiate the CashStore, DrinksStore and initialize it.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fail to initialize stores; reading properties.

      • storeCoin

        public void storeCoin(Coin c)
        This method will instruct the CashStore to store the Coin sent as input, and update the display on the Machinery Simulator Panel.
        Parameters:
        c - the Coin to be stored.

      • getStoreSize

        public int getStoreSize(int type)
        This method return the total size of the Store of the given type of Store.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the Store (either CASH or DRINK).
        Returns:
        the size of the store of the given type of Store.

      • getStoreItems

        public StoreItem[] getStoreItems(int type)
        This method returns an array of StoreItem of the given type of Store.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Store.
        Returns:
        an array of StoreItem.

      • changeStoreQty

        public void changeStoreQty(int type,
                           int idx,
                           int qty)
        This method will either:
        - instruct the CashStore to update the quantity of a Coin denomination to new value supplied and update the total cash held in the CashStore; or
        - instruct the DrinksStore to update the drinks stock for a DrinksBrand required to a new value supplied.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Store.
        idx - the index of the StoreItem.
        qty - the quantity of the StoreItem.

      • getStoreItem

        public StoreItem getStoreItem(int type,
                              int idx)
        This method returns the StoreItem with the given Store type and index of StoreItem.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Store.
        idx - the index of the StoreItem.
        Returns:
        the StoreItem.

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(int idx,
                     int pr)
        This method will sets the price for the StoreItem with the given index and price.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the StoreItem.
        pr - the price of the StoreItem.

      • getTotalCash

        public int getTotalCash()
        This method returns the total number of cash held in the CashStore.
        Returns:
        the total number of cash held.

      • transferAll

        public int transferAll()
        This method will instruct the CashStore to store the Coin sent as input, and then update the display on the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
        Returns:
        the number of cash transfered.

      • closeDown

        public void closeDown()
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method will close down the store management function of the vending machine. This involves saving the attributes of the stores to the property file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fail to save cash properties and drinks properties.

      • dispenseDrink

        public void dispenseDrink(int idx)
        This method instructs the DrinksStore to dispense one drink, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether dispensing was successful.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the drinks to be dispensed.

      • getStore

        public Store getStore(int type)
        This method returns a Store of a specified type (i.e. Cash or Drink).
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Store.
        Returns:
        the Store of the specified type.

      • giveChange

        public void giveChange(int idx,
                       int numOfCoins)
        This method instructs the CashStore to issue a number of Coin of a specific denomination, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It return TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether the change issue was successful.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the Coin.
        numOfCoins - the number of Coin to deduct.
